name: Four Teachers
description:
Welcome! This is my entry for Mini Jam #88: Theme "Rush" and Limitation "Tell a story with no text".

This one is mostly about the limitation, not the theme. So I'm not spoiling it beyond the title: "Four Teachers"

As far as controls go, use your mouse, that's all.

-The Storeman
